name: stackable
content:
Add to word list

intended to be stacked (= arranged one on top of another) easily: His design made the containers stackable, saving kitchen space. They sat on rows of blue plastic, stackable chairs.
More examplesFewer examplesWe store everything in stackable boxes with click-shut lids.Stackable steamer baskets can cook several dishes at a time. Many of the company's stackable storage containers were redesigned to use less plastic.If you have more than one, they're stackable for handy storage when not in use.
